title: Customer Relationship Management (CRM)
description: Our comprehensive CRM module helps you build and maintain strong relationships with your customers. Track interactions, manage leads, and provide exceptional customer service with our powerful CRM solution.

features.title: Lead Management
features.description: Capture, track, and manage leads throughout the sales pipeline. Automate lead scoring and follow-ups to convert prospects into customers.

features.title: Contact Management
features.description: Maintain detailed customer profiles with contact information, interaction history, and preferences. Access customer data instantly for personalized service.

features.title: Sales Pipeline
features.description: Visualize and manage your sales process with a customizable pipeline. Track deals, set milestones, and forecast revenue accurately.

features.title: Customer Support
features.description: Handle customer inquiries and issues efficiently with ticket management, knowledge base, and automated response systems.

features.title: Email Integration
features.description: Seamlessly integrate with email platforms to track communications and maintain conversation history within the CRM.

features.title: Analytics & Reporting
features.description: Gain insights into customer behavior, sales performance, and team productivity with comprehensive analytics and customizable reports.

features.title: Mobile Access
features.description: Access your CRM on the go with our mobile-friendly interface. Stay connected with customers and manage relationships from anywhere.

features.title: Task Management
features.description: Create and assign tasks, set reminders, and track follow-ups to ensure no customer interaction is missed.

features.title: Integration Capabilities
features.description: Connect with other business tools and systems for a unified view of customer interactions across your organization.
